about me

This is sneha studying in Panimalr Engineering College currently perceiving B.E in the department of Computer science and engineering. I am strong,bold,courageous and challengable person.I like to face the challenges in life.I have done my internships on IOT.I have also done the workshop in block chaining.I like to play games like shettle and throw ball. I have done my project based on water marking technique.
